title: Understanding Google Drive Interface
text: To move files in Google Drive, familiarize yourself with the interface. You'll see a list of your files, and on the left, folders are displayed. This structure is central to either dragging files or using menu options for file movements.

title: Exploring File Actions
text: When you right-click or CTRL-click on a file, a menu appears. This menu provides various options for managing the file, including potentially moving it.

title: Navigating Menu Options Within Files
text: Inside a Google Sheets file, navigate to the 'File' menu located in the top left corner. This menu gives specific options that apply to the spreadsheet.

title: Executing a Move Operation
text: Combine your understanding of file interactions outside and inside Google Sheets. Use tools like drag and drop, right-click menu options, and File menu options within the spreadsheet to perform file movements.
